title: Cyberpunk 2077 – v1.5 Steam + 10 DLCs + Bonus Content
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 – v1.5 Steam + 10 DLCs + Bonus Content


Genres/Tags: Action, RPG, First-person, Third-person, 3D, Cyberpunk
Companies: CD Projekt RED, QLOC
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI18
Original Size: 103.1 GB
Repack Size: from 35.2 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: BayFiles
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Cyberpunk.2077.v1.5-CODEX ISO release: codex-cyberpunk.2077.v1.5.iso (61,473,882,112 bytes)
  • Cyberpunk.2077.Language.Pack.v1.5-CODEX (45.4 GB) added
  • Bonus “The World of Cyberpunk 2077” in PDF format (435 MB) added
  • Game version is v1.5; 10 free DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (only when installed with credits videos)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of credits video, bonus content (contains The World of Cyberpunk 2077 PDF, OST, Avatars, Wallpapers, Posters, Short Story and Sourcebook) and voiceovers you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 103.1 to 35.2~80.2 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes (one language, no credits, no bonus content): ~45 minutes on 16-threads CPU; ~1 hour 20 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~2 hours 20 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 113 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 4 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the megalopolis of Night City, where you play as a cyberpunk mercenary wrapped up in a do-or-die fight for survival. Improved and featuring all-new free additional content, customize your character and playstyle as you take on jobs, build a reputation, and unlock upgrades. The relationships you forge and the choices you make will shape the story and the world around you. Legends are made here. What will yours be?

CREATE YOUR OWN CYBERPUNK:
Become an urban outlaw equipped with cybernetic enhancements and build your legend on the streets of Night City.

EXPLORE THE CITY OF THE FUTURE:
Night City is packed to the brim with things to do, places to see, and people to meet. And itâ€™s up to you where to go, when to go, and how to get there.

BUILD YOUR LEGEND:
Go on daring adventures and build relationships with unforgettable characters whose fates are shaped by the choices you make.

EQUIPPED WITH IMPROVEMENTS:
Experience Cyberpunk 2077 with a host of changes and improvements to gameplay and economy, the city, map usage, and more.

INCLUDES FREE ADDITIONAL CONTENT:
Get your hands on a haul of free items including new guns and melee weapons, as well as extra customization options and more.

Patch v1.5 new & improved features

  • Apartments: Apartments can be rented (with a one-time fee) when encountered in Night City or through the EZEstates website when accessed through the computer in V’s Megabuilding H10 apartment. They become available after completing the Playing for Time quest. Itâ€™s possible to rent all apartments at the same time. All apartments share the same stash.
  • Apartments Interactions & Buffs: Take shower interaction, Refreshed buff, Health regen threshold 20% increase buff, Rested buff, Brew coffee interaction & Energized buff.
  • Appearance Customization: You can now tweak certain features of your appearance (such as hair, makeup, piercing, etc.) when using the mirror in any of your apartments and safehouses. Itâ€™s free and you can do it as often as you like. Character customization also includes more makeup and hair color options. Who’s the fairest of them all, now?
  • What’s New at Wilsonâ€™s?: 2 new weapons, 4 new weapon scopes, New type of weapon attachments & 10 new muzzle brakes.
  • New Poses in Photo Mode: We added a number of new poses in Photo Mode, including poses for Johnny Silverhand (only available in flashback scenes when playing as Johnny).
  • Living City Improvements: Combat AI Enhancement, Crowd Improvements, Drive Model Enhancement & Vehicle Traffic Improvement
  • Gameplay Improvements: Various balancing mods & stats, Cyberware Improvements, Various Combat Optimizations, Quickhacking Improvements, Items & Devices, NPC Optimizations, Perks Rebalanced, Player Mechanics, Vehicle Improvements & Weapon Reworks.
  • UI Overhaul: Various map usability improvements, Redesigned the “Skip Time” interface, Updated asset graphics, Improved readability, consistency, visuals in UI panels and many more new features.
  • Various Quest Reworks: Added a few secrets in Night City to be discovered by players, Extended romances with all side characters, Added interactions and many more reworked features.
  • Open World Improvements: New fixer gigs, 100% Completion gigs special reward, Crowds and communities improved behaviours and many more improved features.
  • Other Major Miscellaneous Improvements: Graphics, Audio, Animation, Cinematic designs, Environment & Levels, Stability & Performance and finally PC-specific fixes.

You can skip downloading of credits video, bonus content and voiceovers you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-optional-bonus-content.bin (contains The World of Cyberpunk 2077 PDF, OST, Avatars, Wallpapers, Posters, Short Story and Sourcebook)
  • fg-optional-credits.bin (game credits video, recommended for installation if you plan to apply delta patches on the game)
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-chinese.bin
  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-korean.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS slightly backwards compatible with my previous (v1.3) Cyberpunk 2077 repack. The following files can be rehashed to save up to 1.4 GB of traffic.

  • fg-optional-bonus-content.bin
  • fg-optional-credits.bin
